mapper.select: select code, name, description from tbl_dic_type

select id, code, name, description from tbl_dic_type
where
code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
limit #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_dic_type (id, code, name, description) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{description})
